Course Description: This course is aimed at teaching students about ethical problems that computer scientists face, the codes of ethics of computing professional societies, legal issues involved in technology, and the social implications of computers, computing, and other digital technologies. The aim is to understand and respond to the nuances of a digital society and the challenges it faces.
